add-linting.description: Adds linting configuration to an Angular project.

component-story.description: Creates a stories.ts file for a component.

component-test.description: Creates a cypress component test file for a component.

convert-to-application-executor.description: Converts projects to use the `@nx/angular:application` executor or the `@angular-devkit/build-angular:application` builder.

federate-module.description: Create a federated module, which is exposed by a remote and can be subsequently loaded by a host.

library-secondary-entry-point.description: Creates a secondary entry point for an Angular publishable library.

remote.description: Generate a Remote Angular Module Federation Application.

move.description: Moves an Angular application or library to another folder within the workspace and updates the project configuration.
move.x-deprecated: Use the `@nx/workspace:move` generator instead. This generator will be removed in Nx v19.

convert-to-with-mf.description:
Converts an old micro frontend configuration to use the new withModuleFederation helper. It will run successfully if the following conditions are met: 
 - Is either a host or remote application 
 - Shared npm package configurations have not been modified 
 - Name used to identify the Micro Frontend application matches the project name 

{% callout type="warning" title="Overrides" %}This generator will overwrite your webpack config. If you have additional custom configuration in your config file, it will be lost!{% /callout %}

host.description: Generate a Host Angular Module Federation Application.

ng-add.description: Migrates an Angular CLI workspace to Nx or adds the Angular plugin to an Nx workspace.

ngrx.description: Adds NgRx support to an application or library.
ngrx.x-deprecated: This generator is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Nx. Use the 'ngrx-root-store' and 'ngrx-feature-store' generators instead.

ngrx-feature-store.description: Adds an NgRx Feature Store to an application or library.

ngrx-root-store.description: Adds an NgRx Root Store to an application.

scam-to-standalone.description: Convert an existing Single Component Angular Module (SCAM) to a Standalone Component.

scam.description: Generate a component with an accompanying Single Component Angular Module (SCAM).

scam-directive.description: Generate a directive with an accompanying Single Component Angular Module (SCAM).

scam-pipe.description: Generate a pipe with an accompanying Single Component Angular Module (SCAM).

setup-mf.description: Generate a Module Federation configuration for a given Angular application.

setup-ssr.description: Generate Angular Universal (SSR) setup for an Angular application.

setup-tailwind.description: Configures Tailwind CSS for an application or a buildable/publishable library.

stories.description: Creates stories/specs for all components declared in a project.

storybook-configuration.description: Adds Storybook configuration to a project.

cypress-component-configuration.description: Setup Cypress component testing for a project.
